Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurs in variants that restart with a resubmission by the employee
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' is followed by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' compared to all occurrences of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' relative to the frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events occurring after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that occur in domestic declaration reimbursement flows (identified via absence of pre-approval steps)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of variants ending with 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' versus variants that continue to resubmission and eventual payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events that appear more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that directly follow 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without any intermediate approval steps
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' compared to the total number of completed end-to-end reimbursement processes (i.e., those ending in 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of variants in which 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurs at least once, and their cumulative frequency as a share of total variant frequency
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' among all rejection activities (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' appears without any prior involvement of a budget owner or pre-approver
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in 2018 compared to 2017, based on event timestamps (inferred from case data)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities
